it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.controllers

Class GameSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.controllers.MatchHandler
      • it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.controllers.GameSceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SceneController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GameSceneController
extends MatchHandler
implements SceneController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is the controller of the scene of the game

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • createPlusOrMinusWindow

        public void createPlusOrMinusWindow()
        This method is called when the toolcard that lets you choose if increase or decrease by one the number of the die is used. It opens a new stage in which the player can choose. This stage will close after the choice and will send a message

      • createNumberWindow

        public void createNumberWindow()
        This method is called when the toolcard that lets you move up to two dice is used. In particular, it's called when the player has already moved a die. It opens a new stage in which the player can choose if he wants to move another die or not. This stage will close after the choice and will send a message

      • createOneOrTwo

        public void createOneOrTwo()
        This method is called when the toolcard that lets you choose the number of the die is used. It opens a new stage in which the player can choose. This stage will close after the choice and will send a message

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String text)
        This method is called when something happened and you need to comunicate it to the player
        Parameters:
        text - it's the text you want to show

      • disableAllButton

        public void disableAllButton()
        This method disables all the buttons in the lists. After that, it calls method refreshAll in order to reloads the sub-fxmls and put in them the updated buttons

      • setCurrentState

        public void setCurrentState(State currentState)

      • setToolCardMessage

        public void setToolCardMessage(ToolCardMessage toolCardMessage)

      • setAllButton

        public void setAllButton()
        This method sets disable true or false on every button of the lists, based on the currentState. After that, it calls method refreshAll in order to reloads the sub-fxmls and put in them the updated buttons

      • sendToolCardMessage

        public void sendToolCardMessage()

      • useToolCard

        public void useToolCard(int toolCardIndex)
        This method is called by network input when you receive an ack that allow you to use the toolcard
        Parameters:
        toolCardIndex - is the index (0-2) of the toolcard used

      • buttonCoordinateClicked

        public void buttonCoordinateClicked(Coordinate coordinate)
        This method is called by controller of square button and round tracker button Current state know how handle input
        Parameters:
        coordinate - is the coordinate of the button press

      • buttonDraftPoolClicked

        public void buttonDraftPoolClicked(int drafPoolPosition)
        This method is called by controller of draft pool button
        Parameters:
        drafPoolPosition - is the position of the die to draft in the list

      • clearAndRefreshAll

        public void clearAndRefreshAll()
        This method is called in GUILogic when it's needed to refresh something in the scene. Actually, it refreshes everything. Also, it calls the method checkTurn
